ComicInfo.Summary: In a world where nerds evolved from man, the staff of PvP Magazine rule as kings. Join Brent, Cole, Francis, Jade and Skull the Troll as they chronicle the world of video games, movies, comics and pop-culture. The hit Internet comic strip leaps from the World Wide Web into its own image title!Â It's comic book madness when the PvP gang sets up a booth at their first COMICON. All hell breaks loose when MAX POWERS sets up his own booth across the aisle. Can PvP compete with Max? Will Jade dress up in a slinky booth babe costume to draw in more geeks? Find out in this issue!
